name: Basic Patterns for backgrounds
description:
You can now Download some (and more!) of these patterns as code from https://patterns.helloyes.dev


These patterns were originally provided as a downloadable Figma File on Github by Chris Orebaugh. Exporting images and then using them as tileable background-images is cumbersome. So I made a library out of this file, that exports all of the patterns as Fill styles. After I was done I thought that maybe I wasnâ€™t the only one who needed exactly this, so I published it to Figma Community.


Thank you Chris Orebaugh / @skumando!
